item.description:
Come see a French film (English subtitles) with other French speakers! Click below for more details
As part of the theatre's "April in Paris" series, they will be showing "Baisers Volés" a charming Truffaut love story with Paris as a backdrop. It features a young Jean-Pierre Léaud who starred in many Truffaut films.
Jean-Pierre Léaud retourne dans les Baisers Volés charmants, le troisième versement partiel dans le feuilleton de Doinel d'Antoine. C'est maintenant 1968, et l'espiègle et perpétuellement amour-frappé Doinel a été déshonoramment déchargé de l'armée et relâché sur les rues de Paris, où il trébuche dans la profession peu probable de détective privé et entreprend un feuilleton de mésaventures. Les Baisers fantaisistes nostalgiques et irrépressiblement romantiques et Volés sont les odes de Truffaut éternels à la passion et l'impétuosité de jeunesse.


For description, check out www.aprilinparis.org
Cinestudio is offering many other French films as well. www.cinestudio.org

For those who would like to enjoy delicious pizza avec conversation française before the film, come to Hartford's First & Last Tavern ,939 Maple Ave, Hartford at 5:45. If it's a warm evening, perhaps we can sit outside. Maple Ave is in the South End of Hartford, near the Wethersfield line and Goodwin Park. If you are afraid of getting lost, email me and we can carpool.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the theatre lobby at 7:20 or beforehand at 5:45 for pizza at First & Last Tavern at 939 Maple Ave,Hartford. We will be speaking French!
item.why: Meet other French speakers, enjoy some of Hartford's best pizza, see a film in a true non-profit theatre.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: French film rendezvous! and pizza too!
